content: welcome to my cat coaster crochet pattern the purrfect way to add some feline fun to your home whether you re sipping tea or enjoying a coffee your mug will have the perfect spot with these cute creations **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream - blue jean cotton ▢lily sugar n cream - white cotton ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
